website_summaries.verdict: A nice basic stool that you can customize to match your home's style.
pros: Comes unfinished, so you can paint or stain to match your style
Available in three heights to suit all counters
cons: Seat is flat and may not be as comfortable if you're sitting on it for long periods of time

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stool. High quality & durable. My husband spray painted it black to match my black iron & white marble table. I’m using it for a makeup area. I posted a picture with the stool as it came unfinished & then painted black. Love the slight curve & rounded edges. Hopefully the pictures show you what it looks like. The bench was delivered on time & packed perfectly secure. I’m 100% pleased with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Rising

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, real unfinished hardwood. Good deal! Arrived fully assembled.
customer_reviews.text: This seat came fully assembled but in good condition. There was a sticker that was tough to get off from the underside of the seat, but oh well. I finished this real unfinished hardwood piece with a clear AFM Safecoat sealant. Very nice. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Terrific stool
customer_reviews.text: I needed a stool for my bedroom to use to put on socks and shoes. A few weeks ago I bought a different piece from Amazon that I had to put together. I weigh 195, and each time I sat on it I thought it would collapse. So then I found this stool. It comes assembled, it's quite sturdy and well put together, and though it's unfinished, it looks great. I may not finish it. This is one of the most satisfactory buys I've made on Amazon. Price is very reasonable, delivery was spot on. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Murray H. Schweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Nice stool that took finish very well!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stool. The manufacturer's stickers on the bottom are the same stickers that were on the bottom of two other unfinished wood, 18" saddle seat stool I bought at our local furniture "superstore". This is a sturdy stool that took stain very well. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great hardwood stool - comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these stools that I bought from an unfinished store that closed before i could pick up a second one. This is a perfect match. It's very sturdy and comfortable to sit on. I use it by the front door to put my shoes on (I'm older). It doesn't take up too much space and I will paint it white eventually. The legs are level so there's no wobbling. I wouldn't say it's as comfortable as an upholstered dining chair but it's good for short term seating. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: These stools are very sturdy. I was impressed with the quality of wood ...
customer_reviews.text: These stools are very sturdy. I was impressed with the quality of wood used, and the weight of the stools. They also take stain and paint very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Drennan

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality for a low price
customer_reviews.text: After reading the many excellent reviews on this stool, I decided to buy 3 for my hunting lodge. I am VERY happy and surprised at the outstanding quality of this 18" wooden stool. It sits firm with no wobble whatsoever. It's kind of heavy, which I really like. It's comfortable and the seat has a bit of a bow that makes it nice to sit while I put on my boots. The stickers on the bottom indicate that it was made in Thomasville, NC, USA, which is a bonus to me. I would highly recommend this item for any person who is looking for this type of stool. The price is amazingly inexpensive for the obvious quality of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Jones

customer_reviews.title: Solid Stools, Easy to Finish!
customer_reviews.text: These are well built little stools. They're unfinished, but sanded smooth enough that I put on a coat of primer and then color coat with zero prep to the wood. They turned out great. The wood is nice enough that they would look good stained as well, though they're dense enough you might need wood dye rather than traditional stain. The screws that hold them together are easily accessible so even if they need tightening down the road, no biggy.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice !
customer_reviews.text: I don't need to put them together . So happy about these stools. Looks very nice in my kitchen !
customer_reviews.author: Ying Huang

customer_reviews.title: Lovely stools
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice. I was going to spend double on cheap fake wood stools. These are solid wood came put together. I stained them to match my dinning table chairs and I am so pleased with these stools. Just wish they would be a little wider but exactly what I was looking for for an amazing price. I hope they stand up for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Debra Visocchi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much exactly what I wanted. Very solid, and will take stain well (even though I'm keeping my natural). If there's one negative, it's the same thing other reviewers have mentioned. You need a microscope to see the "curve" in the seat. If you're looking for a "saddle" seat with pronounced curves, this is not it. The naked eye can pick up the slight curve, but only very slight. That's probably why I'm giving it a 4, not a 5.
customer_reviews.author: T. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Use to be better
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth International Concepts 18 inch Saddle Seat Stool I have purchased. The first three were a few years ago and still in use. The newest purchase does not match the style or quality of the first three. It will function as a sturdy stool, but it does not have the same quality feel. The top isn't as dense or defined as my original Saddle Seat Stools.
customer_reviews.author: mcl

customer_reviews.title: Great little stool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy built, solid wood stool, but light in weight. I keep it in the kitchen on a tiled floor, and after these few weeks, it has NOT messed up the tile, at all. The stool is a nice size, that I can quickly sit down on the saddle-style seat, if my back spazes out, but without it being constantly in the way when not in use. I am 5' and the 18" size is perfect. Can honestly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L.D.Black

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I love this stool. I was in between sizes of this one, 29 inches and the 24 inch so I had my carpenter chop off 2 inches of the legs of this one for me and now it fits perfectly under my kitchen peninsula. It is really very comfortable to sit on even though it's solid wood. I also really like the light unfinished wood. Goes with my California beachy decor.
customer_reviews.author: Love to shop...

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this costs $30, the quality is actually outstanding. This is very solid and ergonomic. It's the right height and subtly curved. It doesn't tip or wobble. It's sanded to a glass smooth finish. I'm very impressed, you could not possibly find this cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Oh_ChasquidoTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shower Stool
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a stool I could sit down on when coming out of the shower so that I could pull on my pants, socks, and shoes. I did some experimenting and determined an 18'' height would be correct -- and so it turned out to be. The stool is extremely well made and ultra strong and steady. It seems like an elephant could rest a foot on the stool during a circus performance with little chance of damage to the stool. My photo shows the new stool right at the entrance to my shower where it will remain from now on.
customer_reviews.author: JeepShootist

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Perfect item.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent little stool. It arrived perfectly and is very well constructed. And it arrived already assembled! I needed a small seat/bench near my entry in order to put on and take off my shoes. The area is small so a large bench was out of the question. Smaller benches had a weight limit (no for me, but my guests!!) so this was the perfect solution. I lightly sanded it and painted it the same color of my entry way. It fits the need and looks terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Rd2

customer_reviews.title: Love this stool
customer_reviews.text: This came in one piece and is so sturdy compared to another round stool that I have. I play guitar and sing, and this is just perfect for that. I like the height of the cross pieces of wood for putting my feet upon when I play my guitar. I used Old English oil to put a little bit of a finish on it. I didn't need more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Happily surprised with the quality
customer_reviews.text: A genuine solid wood stool, heavy, strong and well- made. I'm about to paint it in a beautiful cranberry red. It's made of rubberwood, which is rather new to me. I know it's become a popular hardwood recently, because it's more sustainable than many of the more familiar woods. It's dense and heavy-- far superior to pine, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Well made stool perfect for counter height
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made stool and we wanted something we could paint ourselves. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars was because the top edges are pointy and poke the back of your thigh. This is alleviated by putting your feet on the cross bar. Before we paint, we’re going to sand the edges so they’re more rounded. Aside from that, we love the quality and can tell they’ll hold up well over time.
customer_reviews.author: Germaine Sarda

customer_reviews.title: A nice simple short stool
customer_reviews.text: I sometimes need a short stool in my workshop and this one works well for that purpose. The stool seems well made and is as comfortable as a stool can be. I'm using this in a shop so don't care about the finish, but this stool could easily be painted or finished with polyurethane to look nice in a household situation.
customer_reviews.author: Davison Woodworks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in my bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: !y husband and I are older and he has Parkinson's so we need to sit when we get out of the shower to dry our feet and legs. This is the perfect size and very sturdy so we feel comfortable and safe sitting on it. My husband did paint it so it matches the bathroom decor perfectly. The size is big enough for our needs but not big enough to be obtrusive.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful mema

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I needed something this height for a smaller table that I have. I also wanted something I could push under the table when not using to save space. Very well made! Came fully assembled in great packaging. We got 4 and plan to pick a color for each of us.
customer_reviews.author: Painted Luna

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to go with a table made by the same company for my 11 year old son’s bedroom. These stools are very sturdy and strong enough for adults also. I painted these without even sanding. They are super smooth and look really nice. Worth the price to get real wood.
customer_reviews.author: robandlin

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered arrived with a broken cross bar..its replacement arrived with a distinctive wobble..I lightly sanded the bottom of 2 of the legs and no more wobble. Since I was clear coating the kitchen island I gave the counter stool a couple of coats. It looks good and seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: creed

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The chair is great! I got 2 and I use them for my "breakfast bar" which is lower than standard. They are sturdy and well made. The wood was incredibly smooth and beautiful before I painted them. My only regret is painting - I should have stained them!
customer_reviews.author: Emzet

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these. They are well made of a hardwood I don't recognize. They have stickers saying both "factory in Vietnam" and "built in Thomasville NC," so I'm guessing that the pieces were made in Vietnam and then shipped to NC and assembled. They are solid and smooth-- I will oil them with tung oil and they will be great! The dimensions of the legs at the floor are 13 1/2" x 16 1/2", so I can turn them sideways to save space under the table when they are not in use. They also stack in several different ways. Perfect for a tiny home!
customer_reviews.author: BonnieR

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Purchased 3 and they were perfect. NO problems with the legs.
customer_reviews.text: These are great!. I read all the reviews before I purchased and was a little nervous. And to my surprise they have been great. I have purchased 3 of the and had no trouble with any of them. I lightly sanded, primed 2 coats then painted 2 coats with exterior house paint. And they look great. I did use a sealer top coat too. So I put in the work and got a great reward. We did put those felt circles on the legs too so they glide on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: karenrn94

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with these stools
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these stools. They are sturdy and don't take up much room at our corner booth table in our kitchen. They slide under. Something I like the most about them is the gentle curve of the seat makes them much more comfortable than sitting on a flat seat. We've had them for two years and I'm just getting around to writing a review so they've proven they hold up well. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great looking stool, perfect for using at computer desk
customer_reviews.text: Great design, sturdy unfinished stool. Seat is comfortable, though for long use a pillow is recommended :) It is strong and well put together, and fits both children and adults comfortably. Perfect height for our computer desk.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Ketcham

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my great daughter she loves it and enjoys sitting on it with her Pap. It is well made and very good looking. I got a real kick out of it being made in Vietdam since I spend 1969 there in my young .
customer_reviews.author: ham77

customer_reviews.title: Well made stool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a dressing stool in our closet. It's a perfect size and feels quite sturdy. I don't even plan to finish it but it could easily be done - either stained or painted. Great value and timely delivery.
customer_reviews.author: K.G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, seems very solid and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, seems very solid and sturdy, and sits on the floor without wobbles. The finish is smoother than I expected for an unfinished piece, and the quality is higher than I expected at this price point. The seat is barely curved, unlike the way it looks in the picture, but I prefer it that way so it's not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: untidysalt

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy seat
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my bathroom.. when I get out of the shower, I have a towel on the seat... and use it when I put on lotion. I would recommend this seat.. it's sturdy and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Christi9

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little stool! This came totally assembled with no damage. The wood is great quality and it’s extremely solid and sturdy. It took the stain great and it looks so good in my bathroom. Very happy. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Preassembled
customer_reviews.text: Pre-assembled and sturdy. The unfinished wood took the stain and poly well, although some areas of the wood are more porous that the rest, so multiple coats may work better. Overall, well built and engineered.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend, A++ (SO FAR...)
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping, packaged nicely to prevent dents or dings and comes already assembled. My first impressions are it’s very high quality, sturdy and well made. Absolutely 100% worth the price! (keeping in mind, just received today so this is only an initial, first impression). I have a good feeling this will be a long lasting, durable piece, however. Not sure about comfort level..I can imagine it being uncomfortable and not ideal for long periods/hours on end of sitting, at least without adding cushioning of some sort maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Lttle Stool!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 different types of stools. This one I did not have to put together and it is so sturdy! It is smaller, like a regular chair, so be aware of the size.
customer_reviews.author: Z.D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little stool!
customer_reviews.text: This stool is very sturdily made, and, contrary to some reviews I read, it sits perfectly level on my floor. It is the perfect size for a small built-in desk in my breakfast room area where I want to scoot it completely under the desk when not in use. It was easy to finish with chalk paint. The wood is nice and smooth, so no pre painting prep needed. Great little functional piece for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Payne

customer_reviews.title: Love them more than anything!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, even better quality! Absolutely amazing. This is everything I wanted in a bar stool and I couldn’t find it anywhere else. I should mention that these are truly unfinished so if you are looking for something that is easy to clean, expect to finish them properly. I adore the color and the sturdiness and everything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR GARAGE
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Comfortable. I am 71 yrs old. It is great to sit on in the garage and do those "low down" chores. Perfect height. Oak solid as a rock.
customer_reviews.author: WarBucks

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This stool is FANTASTIC! The hardware is sturdy too, which is obviously important. I’ll be buying another one soon to replace a cheap/rickity stool from a craft store.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and very sturdy; great value
customer_reviews.text: Well-made and perfect for a counter-height kitchen island. Definitely recommend sanding and priming/sealing before painting. As other reviewers noted, the top of the seat is flatter than it appears in the pictures, so it's not as comfortable as I'd hoped, but still very sturdy and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: MCXB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy 18” stool
customer_reviews.text: Well made stool. My only issue with it was it the wood doesn’t stain evenly. There were a few areas that I couldn’t send enough to get it even from machining marks. It is great that it come fully assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed them for!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, comfortable, low profile- these were the characteristics I was looking for. They took my stain and waxing well and now blend in with my other dining room furniture. Four now line my windows for a cat lookout. They can be grabbed for extra seating easily. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a low price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 18-inch model. Great little stool. High quality. Sturdily built. Arrived sanded well enough to immediately finish and took stain well.
customer_reviews.author: sagifford

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed & stable stool
customer_reviews.text: Stool being used in our remodeled mater bath. I stained it grey to match our grey driftwood floor tile. Wood was very smooth and needed very little sanding prior to finishing.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Adasiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Great stool at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These are well-made stools. We found them to be receptive to stain, but they could be easily painted, as well. We are very pleased with the end product and anticipate using them for years.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a pub table. I painted the seat and stained the base. It turned out great! Would definitely purchase again would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Cuba

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made, perfect for an 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stool to go with my 8 year old daughter's desk and it's exactly what I hoped for. Sturdy even on high pile carpet, smooth and sleek even though unfinished, and the perfect height for her adult-sized desk. One of the highest quality pieces of furniture I've ever bought online.
customer_reviews.author: Julina Coupland

customer_reviews.title: Beyond impressed!
customer_reviews.text: These seriously are great quality. I was actually surprised by the quality! I expected good, but they are GREAT. Now I just have to decide what color I want them... ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kate Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We remove our shoes upon entering house. House has narrow entrance hall. This sturdy little stool is perfect and the "saddle" is a nice touch for your backside. For the money, it is a fantastic deal
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Solid, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's so much better than I expected! Very solid & sturdy, great price. Needed a little seat for remodeled bathroom & this is perfect. All I did was the stencils and then 2 coats polycrylic. Since the color actually matches the floor, I decided to leave it the natural color.
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for island in our recently remodeled kitchen. If you look closely there are definitely some slight imperfections, a few glue marks, and a few slightly twisted rungs, but perfect for what we need them for. My finish isn't perfect, and we were going for a more farmhouse look anyhow. I stained them, did 3 coats of poly and nailed gliders on the bottom for on the tile floor. Cant beat the price! Definitely would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Sarahlyn D.

customer_reviews.title: Small and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small stool in the bathroom. This one works well. It is unfinished (no wood stain) but it appears to have a clear coat of varnish-like finish on it. I had planned to paint it but am not sure it will adhere well. Did not want to have to sand it.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to read

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in all ways
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Sanded finish very well done. Saddle is just right, not too much. Very comfortable. Best stool I’ve ever used. 18inch unfinished.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: I have never been let down by International Concepts.
customer_reviews.text: Other than using a Mexican blanket for a seat pad I am happy. Good quality materials and workmanship. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Iv

customer_reviews.title: Solid Stool
customer_reviews.text: This stool is well made...very solid made of solid wood. The issue I have with this product is the photo illustration shows the stool as a "saddle" style stool. Which means their is a slight curve to the seat area itself. When I received the stool the seat was flat. I had bought this for my wife because her other stool broke...she had it for years. I would have given this product 5 stars but it was not what was pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Henry B.

customer_reviews.title: Great stool at an even greater price.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a stool for the bathroom vanity that did not break the bank. I wanted something that was sturdy enough to withstand my kids but would look good in the space. This stool is well worth the price. It is sturdy, well made and looks great. I was able to paint it the color I wanted and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: OldBookworm

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Needed seating for a small space that was strong and comfortable....these are perfect though I wish they came in a 20" height...I am adding a few inches to the bottom with a foot attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Great little stool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little stool! Exactly what I was looking for. It comes unfinished so you can do whatever you want to go with any decor. It’s also pretty comfortable. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my little small eating area.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my little small eating area.. Very dirty and were completely assembled when I receive them
customer_reviews.author: Donna Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made Stool. I was impressed. Stain it with our stain and looks fantastic. Came on time with no problems. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle

customer_reviews.title: It's solid and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good, I use it as an entrance chair because I take my shoes off before I enter. This makes it super easy to have somewhere to sit as you put your shoes back on
customer_reviews.author: jayro ayala

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional furniture
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, solid, easily painted or stained. Will last for decades. Perfect stool for a desk, corner, kitchen, porch. Extremely good quality furniture, aesthetically beautiful, high quality wood. For the money, a perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Reid

customer_reviews.title: Love these unfinished!  Can stain to match deck!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 of these. All came individually boxed and did not have to put anything together! All perfect shape! Perfect to sell unfinished! We are staining to match our deck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without this stool.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs a sturdy stool like this one. We use it in our bathroom to dry off, clip toe nails and place bath items. Can be painted, stained or oiled.
customer_reviews.author: Patti G.

customer_reviews.title: The sturdiest and strongest little stool.
customer_reviews.text: This the sturdiest little stool. I use it for a vanity seat and there is zero wobble. The thing is made as sturdy as any stool could come and will last lifetimes. I can't wait to stain or paint the thing. I'm just trying to figure what I want to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Speed

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just what we expected from the pictures and description. It is as comfortable as you would expect a wood seat to be. Just as I
customer_reviews.author: tispaxie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Great product! High quality and sturdy. I bought a second after I received the first one. The second had a small dent in the seat, but it was minor. I finished with linseed oil and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Kizerian

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but this piece exceeded my expectations so far that I have to comment. The workmanship is wonderful. I intended to paint it, but it is so beautiful just the way it came that I don't think I will do anything to it. It is very sturdy and nicely built, and I would even go so far as to call it a work of art. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: craftsmanship excellent, design as best as I have seen
customer_reviews.text: Professional & High Quality & would buy again: Shipping with Prime: 2 days, packaging was incredible-no dings, craftsmanship excellent, design as best as I have seen. The seat is "scooped just enough to actually be comfortable. Obviously, most anyone would not want to sit on these ..for hours but they are perfect for our intended use. Plan for extended seating: foam , matching fabric, elastic hem...slip on or off. Enjoy!!!!!. I plan to buy 4 more.
customer_reviews.author: Photo Nut

customer_reviews.title: Benches
customer_reviews.text: One of the stools was broken on arrival. I sent them back questionable sturdiness
customer_reviews.author: dzak

customer_reviews.title: Finally quality solid wood unfinished furniture is available.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product--my future go to source for furniture. Environmentally responsible wood--tapped out rubber trees--is cut to shape and assembled (other products from this company require a little assembly time.) Accepts stain and paint well (use primer under paint, don't accept the silly home center "the paint is in the primer" propaganda--that only works for interior walls.) Also, if you are planing on staining sand everything to an even grit, preferably around 120, as the piece will accept stain more evenly. It looks good enough to use without a finish, although that will make any sort of spill on there more difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Cornerstone

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sturdy, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Great stool. I need a chair at the end of my table that didn’t stick out and take up floor space when it wasn’t in use. This tucks right in completely, it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Great stools!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and high quality. We finished ours with a gray stain and roughed it up.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy! Great build and matched right in our home. I was able to stain and varnish it to match.
customer_reviews.author: Professional

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LOOKING STOOL
customer_reviews.text: Loved that I could finish it the way I wanted, very study. It was a little off balance but should be easy to fix.
customer_reviews.author: DAWN

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and even though not finished, don’t see it necessary - looks great !
customer_reviews.author: Leo H. Jamros

customer_reviews.title: Solid wood , very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute piece. Solid wood and very sturdy. I spray painted mine white with chalk paint and use it as as small side table
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Bordelon

customer_reviews.title: Ready to finish!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect extra seat in my kitchen. Stained to matched shelves and trim.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Well made, no assembly required. Painted it with enamel spray paint. Looks good. Purchased for my 8 year old grandson's small desk. Totally pleased and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tony M. Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stool. It's very well made, sturdy. It arrived on time and was well packaged. It does come unfinished. I sprayed it with a couple coats of varathane and it's beautiful. Exactly the country look I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Mueller

customer_reviews.title: By FAR the BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is BY FAR the sturdiest, best made "unfinished" stool I've ever seen ... and I'm OLD. 18" is perfect height for vanity bench.
customer_reviews.author: Notgnostic

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better than I hoped. They are very solid and level. I stained and painted them and added sliders to the feet and now they’re just as nice as the $100 prefinished stools I considered. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KGeistfeld

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: Got this stool for my bathroom vanity. Perfect height. Comfortable. You can leave it as is or paint it. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Solid, nice hardware; sanded the edges off (soft wood, looks vaguely like oak or beech) stained/sealed with orange shellac, then satin polyurethane. These I like better than the unassembled but finished choices because there are no plugs or screw holes.
customer_reviews.author: nclefster

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This stool was just the right size for my narrow entry hall. We needed something to sit on when putting on or taking off our shoes before entering the house. Great size, great sturdy construction and an unbelievably value! It was extremely well packaged so there was absolutely no chance for damage. Highly recommended this stool.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Solid bench
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid bench, study and small footprint in closet even unpainted is comfortable to sit on. Shipped quickly, came with no damage
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Rubin

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a spot to sit and put on shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the spot we needed to have a place to sit and put our shoes on. Description was right on. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Concerned mother

customer_reviews.title: Not white
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted... except... the picture made it look white- distressed- it's not white
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: I needed to match the exact color of my office furniture/cupboards. This was a super easy stool to paint to match.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat! Good value.
customer_reviews.text: We'll made stool. Strong for holding my 220 lbs frame. Took stain well, sand before, grain does raise. Better then so much of the junk out there, puts the big box stores to shame.
customer_reviews.author: AtlanticMike

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love that the stool arrived already assembled and it beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Jean-Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice pieces, unfinished
customer_reviews.text: Nice little bench. I stained it and clear coated it. We use it to sit on to put on and take off shoes.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn wiley

customer_reviews.title: the quality is great, the size is perfect and I stained them ...
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere for stools to use at my kitchen table. This height was hard to find. I was surprised that these came assembled, the quality is great, the size is perfect and I stained them black to match my set. I bought two and will most likely buy more. Great find, great price...I highly recommend this stool.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Saddle Stool --- Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This stool is exactly as described. It's sleek appearance is great for a tight space. Even though it is unfinished, the finish is smooth, and the lines of the stool give it a very refined look. The Tips for Finishing that are enclosed are very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: made well
customer_reviews.text: love it and its made well, just what I was looking for. real wood
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Great little stool. Very little needed to prepare for a finish. 4 stars because one of the stretchers was cracked and I had to repair before finishing. I'm a woodworker and if I can build something I need, I will. But for the price of this stool, I would have to build it in less than 2 hours to be ahead. Fairly comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: James J Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Cute stool
customer_reviews.text: I had a specific place I needed a stool. Couldn't find too many choices that fit my needs. But this one was perfect. I would have given 5 stars except it only came in 1 stain. I stained it darker after I received it and it matches fine now. It's made very well. And is comfortable. The finish is sleek and oh so smooth. Great craftsmanship--a word we don't get to use these days.
customer_reviews.author: Farm girl

product_meta.title: International Concepts 24-Inch Saddle Seat Stool, Unfinished
product_meta.description: Size:24-inchFor those who appreciate high quality wood furniture with a traditional and elegant look. International Concepts home furnishings will complement any decor.
feature_bullets: Strength Group: B6 (same group as maple)
